main.title: Mateus Andrade
main.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
main.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions and transforming ideas into reality through code.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an Information Systems student at UFOP with practical experience in full stack development, working on e-commerce projects across back-end, front-end, and mobile. I have worked as a freelancer and currently contribute at a large company, primarily using React on the front-end and PHP on the back-end.
about.description2: In my projects, I have acted as a Full Cycle Developer, participating in all stages—from conception to deployment—with a focus on stability, performance, and security. I have worked with React, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL for data management. I utilize Docker to create standardized development environments, facilitate container versioning, and ensure scalability of applications across different environments (development, staging, and production). I am passionate about technology and constantly seek continuous learning and innovation.
